title: Green to glory
creator_credit: Lionel Hoare and British Pathe Production
brief_description: A film about British motor racing, featuring such famous drivers as Jim Clark and Graham Hill. Some of the behind-the-scenes activities of mechanics and designers are shown and the film describes how motor racing leads to improvement in saloon cars. Various types of races are seen, from the amateur hill climb to the professional Grand Prix. Emphasis is placed on the high international reputation of Britain’s designers and drivers.
